mil7.6.3:1.2_1: peṇāhikā sakapatimhi usūyāya chāpake na posayati;
mil7.6.3:1.3_1: yoginā yogāvacarena sakamane kilese uppanne usūyāyitabbaṁ,
mil7.6.3:1.3_2: satipaṭṭhānena sammāsaṁvarasusire pakkhipitvā manodvāre kāyagatāsati bhāvetabbā.
mil7.6.3:2.1_1: peṇāhikā pavane divasaṁ gocaraṁ caritvā sāyaṁ pakkhigaṇaṁ upeti attano guttiyā;
mil7.6.3:2.2_1: yoginā yogāvacarena ekakena pavivekaṁ sevitabbaṁ saṁyojanaparimuttiyā,
mil7.6.3:2.2_2: tatra ratiṁ alabhamānena upavādabhayaparirakkhaṇāya saṅghaṁ osaritvā saṅgharakkhitena vasitabbaṁ.
